title: Decommissioning of a fuel oil-fired thermoelectric power plant in Brazil - Economic feasibility under certain and risk conditions
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 8

Author(s): Amadeu Junior da Silva Fonseca, Roberto Castro, Dorel Soares Ramos, João Carlos de Oliveira Mello, Luiz Célio Souza Rocha, Camila Seibel Gehrke, Edvaldo Pereira Santos Júnior, Wilton Lima Sousa, Luiz Moreira Coelho Junior
